common.redirect: You will be redirected to the external page:

requirements.text: Please provide the following data, as required by Regulation (EU) 2019/788 on the European citizens’ initiative_

initiative.register_webpage: Web address of this initiative in the European Commission's register
initiative.partially-registered: Only a part(s) of this initiative has(ve) been registered_ Please read the Commission Decision for the scope of the registered initiative_

form.title: Support this initiative proposed by European Union citizens
form.support-country: Support this citizens’ initiative by filling in the form or using an eID
form.eID-form: use the eID of your country
form.generic_error: Please correct the errors in the statement of support form
form.certify-info: I hereby certify that the information that I have provided in this form is correct and that I have not already supported this initiative_
form.privacy-statement: I have read the Privacy statement and the content of this citizens’ initiative_
form.certify-info-eID: I hereby certify that I have not already supported this citizens’ initiative_
form.captcha-image-title: Enter the characters you see in the picture
form.captcha-audio-download: Listen and type the characters you hear
form.link-support: How to sign up to a European citizens’ initiative
form.support-footer1: To support a European citizens’ initiative, you must:
form.support-footer2: 1_ be a European Union citizen (i_e_ a national of an EU country);
form.support-footer3: 2_ be old enough to vote in European Parliament elections or, in the case of some nationalities, be 16 years old_
form.support-footerDE: If you reside outside Germany, you need to have registered your current permanent residence at the relevant German diplomatic representation_
form.optional-validacion-desc: The format of my personal identification (document) number and/or postal code is correct
form.optional-validacion-text: Please ignore this error and continue

error.document_cy_id_card: Invalid format_ Format required: 1 to 10 digits

error.document_es_id_card: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNL (N = digit; L = letter)

error.document_hu_passport: Invalid format_ Format required: LLNNNNNN or LLNNNNNNN (L = letter; N = digit)
error.document_hu_personal_number: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNNNN (N = digit)
error.document_hr_personal_id: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNNNN (N = digit)
error.document_it_passport: Invalid format_ Format required: LLNNNNNNN or LNNNNNN or  NNNNNNL (N = digit; L = letter)

error.document_lt_personal_number: Invalid format_ Format required: GYYMMDDNNNN (G = digit between 1 to 6; YY= years, MM = month, DD = day; N = digit)
error.document_lv_personal_id: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNNNN (N = digit)
error.document_mt_id_card: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNL (N = digit; L = letter)
error.document_pt_id_card: Invalid format_ Format required: N, NN, NNN, NNNN, NNNNN, NNNNNN, NNNNNNN or NNNNNNNN (N = digit)
error.document_pt_passport: Invalid format_ Format required: LNNNNNN or LLNNNNNN (N = digit; L = letter)
error.document_pt_citizens_card: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNNLLN (N = digit; L = letter)
error.document_pl_national_id_number: Invalid format_ Format required: YYXXDDNNNNN (YY= years, XX = digit between: 01-12 or 21-32 or 41-52 or 61-77 or 81-92, DD = day; N = digit)
error.document_ro_id_card: Invalid format_ Format required: LLNNNNNN (N = digit; L = letter)
error.document_ro_passport: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNN or NNNNNNNNN (N = digit)
error.document_ro_personal_id: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNNNNNN (N = digit)
error.document_se_personal_number: Invalid format_ Format required: YYMMDD-NNNN or YYYYMMDD-NNNN or YYMMDDNNNN or YYYYMMDDNNNN (Y= year, M= month, D= day, N = digit)
error.document_si_personal_number: Invalid format_ Format required: NNNNNNNNNNNNN (N = digit)

map.threshold-definition: To be successful, a European citizens' initiative has to reach one million statements of support as well as minimum thresholds in at least 7 countries_

map.legend_any: Countries without any statements of support

privacy.title: Privacy statement
privacy.info: #TBT# In accordance with Regulation (EU) 2018/1725 and Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (the General Data Protection Regulation) your personal data provided on this form will only be used for the support of the initiative and made available to the competent national authorities for the purpose of verification and certification_ You are entitled to request from the European Commission and from the representative of the group of organisers of the initiative or, where appropriate, the legal entity created by it, access to, rectification of, erasure and restriction of processing of your personal data_ Your data will be stored by the European Commission for a maximum retention period of one month after the submission of the initiative to the European Commission or 21 months after the beginning of the collection period, whichever is the earlier_ It might be retained beyond these time limits in the case of administrative or legal proceedings, for a maximum of one month after the date of conclusion of these proceedings_ Without prejudice to any other administrative or judicial remedy, you have the right to lodge at any time a complaint with the European Data Protection Supervisor or with a data protection authority, in particular in the Member State of your habitual residence, place of work or place of the alleged infringement if you consider that your data is unlawfully processed_ The European Commission and the representative of the group of organisers of the initiative or, where appropriate, the legal entity created by it, are joint controllers within the meaning of Regulation (EU) 2018/1725 and the General Data Protection Regulation and can be contacted using the details provided on this form_ The contact details of the data protection officer of the group of organisers (if any) are available at the web address of this initiative in the European Commission's register, as provided in point 4 of this form_ The contact details of the data protection officer of the European Commission, of the national authority which will receive and process your personal data, of the European Data Protection Supervisor and of the national data protection authorities can be consulted at: https://ec_europa_eu/citizens-initiative/public/data-protection_

disabled.title: The collection of statements of support for this initiative has been disabled
